Audio.Author: Oscar H. Marín-Gómez
Audio.Comments: Ref: Tape OHM000A27:55. Another Two birds calling in mature forest understory, near to Bremen campament. In the background at 1:55 two Henicorhian leucophrys singing and at 2:39 another Cauca Guan issuing flight call. Low Montane Forest. Distance to Mic: 25m. Not filtering. Natural vocalization.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
